long_description: Arm yourself for a day of shredding the slopes with the waterproof, insulated Burton Scarlet jacket. It will protect you from nasty weather so you'll have even more fun out there on the hill. DRYRIDE Durashell(TM) two-layer coated polyester shell with critically taped seams provides windproof, waterproof and breathable protection from the elements. 60g 3M(TM) Thinsulate(TM) insulation in the body and 40g in the sleeves is placed strategically to retain warmth and keep you comfortable on cold days. Breathable taffeta lining keeps warmth inside and wicks away moisture. Contoured, adjustable fleece hood fits the shape of your head, providing good warmth without obstructing vision; removable faux fur trim adds appeal. Removable waist gaiter with jacket-to-pants interface creates a barrier against snow entry with compatible Burton pants (sold separately). Includes zippered hand pockets, two snap-close chest pockets, two internal stash pockets and an internal goggles/media pocket. Wrist gussets have thumbholes to help keep your wrists warm and prevent cold air from getting in. The Burton Scarlet jacket is built for layering without being overly baggy; sleeves are designed with a bit of extra length to fit over your gloves and keep snow out.
